---

## Instructions for Using This Template

### Daily Reports
- Focus on: Test execution for the day, new defects, blockers
- Keep brief: 1-2 pages
- Distribution: Team members, project manager

### Weekly Reports
- Focus on: Week's progress, cumulative metrics, trends
- Include: All sections with weekly data
- Distribution: Team, stakeholders, management

### Sprint/Iteration Reports (Agile/Scrum)
- Focus on: Sprint test results, sprint goals met
- Include: Sprint-specific metrics, retrospective items
- Distribution: Scrum team, product owner, stakeholders

### Phase Reports (Waterfall)
- Focus on: Phase completion criteria, comprehensive results
- Include: Full detailed analysis, all metrics
- Distribution: All stakeholders, management, approval authorities

### Final Test Report
- Focus on: Complete test summary, go/no-go recommendation
- Include: All sections, comprehensive analysis, lessons learned
- Distribution: All stakeholders, executive management

---
**End of Test Execution Report Template**
